meanings.sent1: She carefully enucleated the cell to study its structure.
meanings.sent2: The scientist enucleated the cell to observe the nucleus.
meanings.sent3: The student enucleating the cell under the microscope looked like a tiny surgeon.
meanings.sent4: Enucleating the cell was like taking out the heart of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: With precision, she enucleated the cell, revealing its inner workings.

meanings.sent1: He enucleated all the weeds from the garden to make it neat.
meanings.sent2: The dentist enucleated the decayed tooth to prevent further damage.
meanings.sent3: The chef enucleating the seeds from the fruit made it easier to eat.
meanings.sent4: Enucleating the old paint from the wall revealed a fresh surface underneath.
meanings.sent5: By enucleating the clutter, she created a clean and organized space.
